name: Pacman (Kari Pihkala)
overview: Pac Man clone by Kari Pihkala released in Assassins PD Games Volume 16. The game supports one and two player play and even a cooperate mode where players work together to clear the board. A Pac-Man clone for the Amiga, with bold, smoothly moving graphics. The gameplay is basically identical with the original (albeit not down to level layouts or the behaviour of the individual ghosts). The game can be played with joysticks, mouse or keyboard, and by two players simultaneously.
